body:
retrained_graph.pb and retrained_labels.txt are not created when run 
python retrain.py \
  --bottleneck_dir=bottlenecks \
  --how_many_training_steps=500 \
  --model_dir=inception \
  --summaries_dir=training_summaries/basic \
  --output_graph=retrained_graph.pb \
  --output_labels=retrained_labels.txt \
  --image_dir=flower_photos

but it created train all flowers into bottlenecks folder .Please any idea
